comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her husband Richard P. Stegler was involved in a German spy scandal; Mrs. Annette Stegler (formerly Annette Lou Pope of Atlanta, b. 1891) was arrested in early 1915 for felonious assault when she attacked a German newspaper reporter with a seltzer bottle at the Hotel Grenoble, and then beat him with a cane.  (She seems to have married three times in life, to men named Dodson and Dottenheim as well as Mr. Stegler.)
